## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's code standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] Test coverage meets the minimum threshold (70%+)

### TypeScript

- [ ] No TypeScript errors
- [ ] No use of `any` type (or justified if used)
- [ ] Proper types/interfaces defined and exported

### Performance & Security

- [ ] I have considered performance implications
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Environment variables used for sensitive data
- [ ] Input validation implemented where necessary

### Accessibility

- [ ] Semantic HTML used
- [ ] ARIA labels added where necessary
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works
- [ ] Color contrast meets standards

### Quality Gates

- [ ] `npm run typecheck` passes
- [ ] `npm run lint` passes
- [ ] `npm run format:check` passes
- [ ] `npm test` passes
- [ ] `npm run build` succeeds

### Code Review

- [ ] I have reviewed the [CODE_REVIEW.md](../blob/main/CODE_REVIEW.md) checklist
- [ ] All applicable items from the 10-point checklist are addressed
- [ ] I am ready for peer review
